ministry.name: Radio Ministry
ministry.overview: Our Mission: To spread the bible teachings of Pastor Allen Rigg to the community of Austin and throughout the world. To create professional and compelling commercials and radio programs that bring the listener to a closer relationship to Christ.

p.strong: Our Vision: To equip the servants through service and fellowship. To reach the lost through the bible teachings of Allen Rigg. To producer professional radio programs and commercials to edify the body of Christ. To facilitate the development of a Calvary Satelite Network radio station here in Austin, TX.

long-description.p: For more information, check the Scheduled Media page for broadcasting information.
